title: TikTok videos will be longer so revenue can be higher
content:
Last year, TikTok announced it will be extending the maximum length of its videos from one to three minutes. Since August, the social media giant has been conducting extensive beta testing of five-minute videos to various groups of users. There have even been tests of 10-minute videos with small groups.

more…

The post TikTok videos will be longer so revenue can be higher appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Last year, TikTok announced it's extending the length of its videos from one to three minutes-beta testing is currently underway.
